title: Where TF is draft?
body:
The title. I logged in, wanting to play some normal drafts now that ranked is over. But I notice it is gone. I proceed to play 4 blind pick, where i get cancer from not getting the role i want, ppl stealing my role even I take it first, and people being much more retarded than even in draft pick. After that I stopped playing leauge.

WHy is it gone? I seriusly can not understand why they would remove normal draft picks, just cuz ranked draft is gone.

replies.body:
Normal Draft will be retired at the start of preseason for all regions except North America, Europe West, and Brazil. Our goal is to offer the fewest number of queues that give unique experiences (so we can keep queues healthy) while keeping disruption low, and in all regions except NA/EUW/BR, normal draft had very low participation. In an ideal world, weâ€™d like to retire normal draft in all regions.

http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/how-rank-2017-season
Are you on the OCE servers? Because we've not had that for ages if at all.
